Text.Value: What would you have of us now, sir?
What would you have of us now, madam?
What would you have of us now, True Soul?
Continue your duties in the area - whatever those are.
Go safely, True Soul.

EditorData.NodeContext: Saying goodbye to the player. She means it.

Text.Value: That's right. He's safe now. Blessed.
Yes, we'll praise you in our prayers, True Soul.
What were you doing before the owlbear attacked?
What? You...? But that means... I have to stop you. For the Absolute!
Absolute protect you.
Go safely, True Soul.

EditorData.NodeContext: Saying goodbye to the player. She means it.

Text.Value: Absolute protect us...
Find the nearest stronghold and report on your mission.
Find the nearest stronghold and report on your mission.
The Absolute wants them found, one way or another.
We were sent to look for fugitives. Some survivors from a crashed ship a ways west along the Chionthar.
Perhaps. Who truly knows the ways of our god?
Carry on with your hunt, then.
Edowin told us there was a camp of faithful goblins nearby. It'll do me good to be among allies.
He died honourably. You should be proud.
It's... dead. We couldn't have done it without you. Thank you.

EditorData.logicalname: In Cave, Owlbear Dead, brother alive

Text.Value: Edowin told us there was a camp of faithful goblins nearby. We'll find safe harbour there. He'd... want us among friends.
I wish Edowin were here. He would have been honoured to fight alongside you.
I suppose... I suppose the Absolute keeps some mysteries from us all.

EditorData.NodeContext: Trying very hard not to cry.

Text.Value: It seems you've found one of your fugitives. Me.
Resume your duties in the area - whatever those are.
We lost Andrick. Sir.
We lost Andrick. Ma'am.
We lost Andrick. True Soul.

EditorData.NodeContext: Heartbroken. Her other brother died in the owlbear fight. Trying to hold it together.
EditorData.logicalname: In cave, owlbear dead, brother dead

Text.Value: The beast's ahead. We need to get closer.
What would you have of me now, sir?
What would you have of me now, madam?
What would you have of me now, True Soul?

EditorData.NodeContext: Trying to rally. Trying to be brave.

Text.Value: Absolute protect you.
Thank you.

EditorData.NodeContext: Small. She's comforted. Holding back tears.

Text.Value: Yes. That's what Edowin would say. And what Andrick would've done, too.
He's... with Edowin now, right? He's with the Absolute.

Synopsis: Novice Brynna. a junior member of the cult of the Absolute, has been sent by hersupposed superior to attack an owlbear - a wild creature that killed another cultist. She reacts to the monster's presence before attacking it, then seeks orders from the player once it is dead.
